summary: A neural module that converts raw textual input into the representation format required by the XCLIP multimodal model, handling tokenization, positional encoding, and projection into the shared embedding space.
business_intent: Facilitate the incorporation of textual data into cross‑modal AI applications such as image‑text retrieval, caption generation, and multimodal search by providing ready‑to‑use text embeddings compatible with XCLIP.
